google_sql_ssl_cert.description: Creates a new SQL Ssl Cert in Google Cloud SQL.

instance.description: The name of the Cloud SQL instance. Changing this

common_name.description: The common name to be used in the certificate to identify the

project.description: The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it

sha1_fingerprint.description: The SHA1 Fingerprint of the certificate.

private_key.description: The private key associated with the client certificate.

server_ca_cert.description: The CA cert of the server this client cert was generated from.

cert.description: The actual certificate data for this client certificate.

cert_serial_number.description: The serial number extracted from the certificate data.

create_time.description: The time when the certificate was created in RFC 3339 format,

expiration_time.description: The time when the certificate expires in RFC 3339 format,
